meanings.definition: A type of cornbread made with cornmeal
meanings.sent1: My grandma's pones are the best cornbread I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious pones with honey butter.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the pones on the floor, but my dog happily cleaned them up.
meanings.sent4: The warm pones melted in my mouth like a sweet treat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked pones filled the kitchen with a comforting smell.

meanings.definition: To beat or defeat someone decisively
meanings.sent1: The champion pones his opponents in every match.
meanings.sent2: She pones her friends in chess every time they play.
meanings.sent3: The team pones the other team so quickly, they didn't even see it coming.
meanings.sent4: His determination to pones his fears helped him overcome them.
meanings.sent5: The superhero pones the villain with a single powerful punch.

meanings.definition: A type of bread or cake made with cornmeal and water, typically baked or fried
meanings.sent1: The bakery's pones were a popular choice among customers.
meanings.sent2: I love having pones for breakfast with a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a fun time making pones in their cooking class.
meanings.sent4: The golden brown pones looked irresistible on the table.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked pones filled the kitchen with a comforting smell.
